shapelib-1.3.0-2.el7.x86_64.rpm gdal gdal-libs gdal-devel gdal-python
python-nose numpy gdal-python
geos geos-devel geos-python
c-ares postgresql10-libs python2-psycopg2 pgbouncer
bitstream-vera-fonts-common bitstream-vera-sans-fonts postgresql-libs opt-lifemapper-mapserver
lifemapper-cctools lifemapper-cmd lifemapper-libevent lifemapper-solr
opt-lifemapper-coverage opt-lifemapper-dendropy opt-lifemapper-egenix-mx-base opt-lifemapper-idigbio opt-lifemapper-pytest opt-lifemapper-requests opt-lifemapper-unicodecsv
opt-lifemapper-biotaphy-otol opt-lifemapper-idigbio
lifemapper-lmserver lifemapper-webclient rocks-lifemapper roll-lifemapper-server-usersguide
lifemapper-env-data lifemapper-image-data lifemapper-species-data
/sbin/ldconfig
# set up lmwriter user ID=`/bin/egrep -i "^lmwriter" /etc/group` if [ "$ID" == "" ] ; then # adding lmwriter user /usr/sbin/useradd -c "Lifemapper user" lmwriter else # adding lmwriter user, group already exists (from lifemapper-compute roll) /usr/sbin/useradd -c "Lifemapper user" -g lmwriter lmwriter fi
# set up solr user ID=`/bin/egrep -i "^solr" /etc/group` if [ "$ID" == "" ] ; then # adding solr user /usr/sbin/useradd -c "Solr user" solr fi
# FE directory NOT exported to /share /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmserver/data/species /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmserver/data/image /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmserver/data/test /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmserver/data/solr/data/cores /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmserver/data/solr/data/logs /bin/chgrp -R lmwriter /state/partition1/lmserver /bin/chmod -R g+ws /state/partition1/lmserver # reset solr permissions /bin/chown -R solr:solr /state/partition1/lmserver/data/solr /bin/chmod -R 775 /state/partition1/lmserver/data/solr
# FE directory NOT exported to /share /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmscratch /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmscratch/log /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmscratch/log/users /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmscratch/log/errors /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmscratch/makeflow /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmscratch/run /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lmscratch/worker /bin/chgrp -R lmwriter /state/partition1/lmscratch /bin/chmod -R g+ws /state/partition1/lmscratch
# FE directory shared with lifemapper-compute, exported to /share /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lm /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lm/data/layers /bin/mkdir -p /state/partition1/lm/data/archive /bin/chgrp -R lmwriter /state/partition1/lm /bin/chmod -R g+ws /state/partition1/lm
for item in "config" "Lm*" "__init__.py*" ; do /bin/chgrp -R lmwriter /opt/lifemapper/$item /bin/chmod -R g+ws /opt/lifemapper/$item done
lmserver &Kickstart_PrivateHostname;:/export/& lm &Kickstart_PrivateHostname;:/export/&
/etc/init.d/autofs restart /opt/rocks/bin/rocks sync users
# add solr index files /opt/lifemapper/rocks/bin/solr-index
chkconfig --add solr chkconfig solr on
